## Workshop Faculty

### [Sachiko Ozawa, PhD](https://pharmacy.unc.edu/directory/ozawa/)
**University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill**

Dr. Ozawa is a health economist and Associate Professor in the Eshelman School of Pharmacy. She leads the WISE project and specializes in pharmaceutical supply chain modeling and agent-based simulation methods.

### [Sean Sylvia, PhD](https://ssylvia.io)
**University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill**

Dr. Sylvia is an Associate Professor in the Gillings School of Global Public Health. His research focuses on health economics, experimental methods, and machine learning applications in health policy.
